history.content: An L-bracket is just two rectangular cuboids joined perpendicularly along one face. Think of it as:  Cuboid A (leg 1)  Cuboid B (leg 2) They meet at a right angle (90°) along a shared edge. the cuboids should be both 6cm by 3 cm by 1 cm and should share the 3cm edge, one should be upright and one should be lying flat and the should share that 3cm edge with overlap and no overhand on the XY plane

{"status": "ready_to_execute", "assistant_message": "I will create an L-bracket by modeling two cuboids, each 6cm x 3cm x 1cm, joined perpendicularly along a shared 3cm edge on the XY plane.", "questions": [], "plan": ["1. Create a sketch on the XY plane for the first cuboid.", "2. Add a rectangle for the first cuboid (6cm x 3cm) on the XY plane.", "3. Extrude the first rectangle to 1cm to form the first cuboid.", "4. Create a sketch on the YZ plane for the second cuboid.", "5. Add a rectangle for the second cuboid (6cm x 1cm) on the YZ plane.", "6. Extrude the second rectangle to 3cm to form the second cuboid, ensuring it shares the 3cm edge with the first cuboid."], "actions": [{"action": "create_sketch", "params": {"plane": "XY"}}, {"action": "add_rectangle", "params": {"sketch_id": "sk_0", "x1": 0, "y1": 0, "x2": 6, "y2": 3}}, {"action": "extrude_last_profile", "params": {"distance": 1, "operation": "NewBody"}}, {"action": "create_sketch", "params": {"plane": "YZ"}}, {"action": "add_rectangle", "params": {"sketch_id": "sk_1", "x1": 0, "y1": 0, "x2": 6, "y2": 1}}, {"action": "extrude_last_profile", "params": {"distance": 3, "operation": "Join"}}], "requires_confirmation": true}
